name: ai-portfolio
description: AI Portfolio Chatbot - Full Stack Project

scripts.dev:backend: dotenv -e backend/.env.local -- mvn -f backend/pom.xml compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=com.aiportfolio.backend.BackendApplication
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && mvn clean install
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
